variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a premature stop codon, leading to the production of a truncated and non-functional protein.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line stably expressing wild-type P53.

Readout description.Result Description: The protein expression for the variant NM_000546.5:c.918A>T was undetectable.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type P53 cDNA served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than or equal to 80% of wild-type P53.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 20% of wild-type P53.
